# Portfolio React Project

React portfolio website built with Vite and TypeScript.

## Project Setup Status

- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md
- [ ] Scaffold Vite + React project
- [ ] Create component structure
- [ ] Set up routing and theme system
- [ ] Install dependencies
- [ ] Run development server

## Tech Stack

- React 18
- TypeScript
- Vite
- React Router
- CSS Modules
- Font Awesome

## Components

- Header with navigation and theme toggle
- About section
- Services section
- Experiences section
- Portfolio gallery
- Contact form
- Footer
